sentences.sContent: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.sContent_eng: When his sled broke down, he repaired it.
sentences.sCn: 当他的雪橇坏掉时，他自己维修。

sentences.sContent: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hut stands at the foot of a near vertical wall of rock in an icy fjord in the high Arctic, a week away by dog sled from the nearest human settlement.
sentences.sCn: 小屋坐落在高纬度北极地区峡湾边一座几乎是垂直的山岩下，从最近的有人居住的地方到此地，狗拉的雪橇要走一个星期。

phrases.pCn: 雪橇犬；雪橇狗；拉雪橇的狗

words.tran: 乘雪橇；适用雪橇的地面状况；进行情况
乘雪橇；用雪橇运（sled的ing形式）
用雪橇搬运；乘雪橇；用大锤打
